dict.acceptation: 改革，创新；新观念；新发明；新设施；

sent.orig: The integrative evaluation of innovation ability, innovation input, innovation process, and innovation performance are probed.
sent.trans: 探讨了创新能力、创新投入、创新过程和创新绩效的集成评价。

sent.orig: The model of independence-innovation includes original innovation, compositive innovation, absorbant innovation.
sent.trans: 自主创新的方式主要包含原始创新、集成创新和消化创新。

sent.orig: Pass study, realize academic innovation, system innovation and working innovation ceaselessly.
sent.trans: 通过学习，不断实现理论创新、制度创新和工作创新。

sent.orig: The system of technical innovation is made the innovation subject, innovational subject, organizational and institutional arrangements.
sent.trans: 技术创新体系包括了技术创新主体、客体、技术创新实施的各种组织和制度安排。

sent.orig: Economics innovation cannot leave the innovation of methodology.
sent.trans: 经济学创新离不开方法论的创新。
